title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Social Subject Job Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and fundamental job-related competencies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners enhance collaborative competencies by solving at least three practical social studies problems using digital tools (smartphone apps) in a blended learning environment.
Participants engage in online discussions (twice weekly) linked to offline classes, presenting opinions on social phenomenon analysis topics at least once and incorporating peer feedback.
Learners design and present blended learning strategies suitable for a social studies job scenario (selecting one from five given cases) through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
